feed.title: Renjith Ramachandran
feed.subtitle: My blog to publish some thoughts and strategies on Technology, Strategy, Management

entry.title: First Post on Jekyll Blog
entry.content: After a long time I am planning to start some writing to post my thoughts on Technology, Strategy, Management and other related topics. I am using Jekyll to create a static web site based post hosted on Github.
entry.summary: After a long time I am planning to start some writing to post my thoughts on Technology, Strategy, Management and other related topics. I am using Jekyll to create a static web site based post hosted on Github.
